TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CbqQueryVersionInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information about a specific version of a Content By Query Web Part.

remarks.para: You can change the settings of a new Content By Query Web Part so that it returns the same data to the XSLT transformation engine. You can obtain a user object for a specific Content By Query Web Part by using the object. The feed uses this object to cache version information about a specific Content By Query Web Part.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataColumnRenames { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the columns to rename after the data has been retrieved.
Docs.value: A string containing the pairs of old and new column names.

remarks.para: Column renames are separated by semicolons and are in the format "originalName,newName." A new column name must not be present in the data or the rename is not performed,

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataMappings { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data mappings.
Docs.value: A string that specifies the data mappings

remarks.para: Data mapping enables the columns that have been retrieved from data to map to the display slot on the current style. Since it enables multiple columns to map to one slot, it selects the value from the first non-empty column.

Data mappings are separated by ”|”. Each data mapping is in the format "slot name : column information".If there is more than one column, each column’s information is separated by”;”.For example, the syntax "slot name : column1 information ; column2 information" separates the information of each column.Each column’s information is in the format "column Guid , column internal name , column type".

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FeedDescription { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string value that describes the Content By Query Web Part version information feed.
Docs.value: A string value that describes the Content By Query Web Part version information feed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FeedTitle { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the title of this Content By Query Web Part version information feed.
Docs.value: A string value that represents the title of the Content By Query Web Part version information feed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::WebControls::ContentByQueryWebPart::ProcessData ^ ProcessDataDelegate { Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::WebControls::ContentByQueryWebPart::ProcessData ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::WebControls::ContentByQueryWebPart::ProcessData ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Delegate called to process data before it is sent to the XSL transform.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCopyUtil { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the URL for items should use the View Property page.

remarks.para: Objects that are not streamed, such as announcements or calendar events, do not have an associated URL. When you set this property to true, objects that are not streamed have an associated URL that points to the View property of the item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::CrossListQueryInfo ^ VersionCrossListQueryInfo { Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::CrossListQueryInfo ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::CrossListQueryInfo ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value of an object that represents data about how to perform a cross list query with audience targeting.
Docs.value: An object that represents data about how to perform a cross list query with audience targeting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WebAndBelow { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to return data from the current Web site and its child sites.
Docs.value: True to return the data from the current Web site and its child sites; otherwise, False.
